mapper.select: with cte_net as (SELECT source_id, time, property_name, property_value, LEAD(time, 1) over (partition by source_id, property_name order by time) endTime FROM thingworx2080.dbo.value_stream with (nolock) where time > CONVERT(varchar(100), #{startTime}, 21) and time < CONVERT(varchar(100), #{endTime}, 21) and property_type = 2 ), CT AS (SELECT [No] , A.[Hole] , [IP] , description , TagName FROM [thingworx2080].[dbo].[Lens_info] A LEFT JOIN [thingworx2080].[dbo].[lensDescription] B on A.Hole = B.Hole) select replace(substring(source_id, 28, 10), '_', '') as machineName, property_name as alarmType, CONVERT(varchar(100), time, 120) as startTime, case when CONVERT(varchar(100), endTime, 120) is not null then CONVERT(varchar(100), endTime, 120) else CONVERT(varchar(100), time, 120) end as endTime, CT.description as alarmDesc, case when endTime is not null then datediff(SS, time, endTime) else 0 end as duration from cte_net LEFT JOIN CT ON CT.No = substring(source_id, 28, 10) and CT.TagName = cte_net.property_name where property_value = 'true' and endTime is not null and datediff(SS, time, endTime) > 20

with cte_net as (SELECT source_id, time, property_name, property_value, LEAD(time, 1) over (partition by source_id, property_name order by time) endTime FROM thingworx2080.dbo.value_stream with (nolock) where time > CONVERT(varchar(100), #{startTime}, 21) and time < CONVERT(varchar(100), #{endTime}, 21) ), CT AS (SELECT [No] , A.[Hole] , [IP] , description , TagName FROM [thingworx2080].[dbo].[Lens_info] A LEFT JOIN [thingworx2080].[dbo].[lensDescription] B on A.Hole = B.Hole) select replace(substring(source_id, 28, 10), '_', '') as machineName, property_name as alarmType, [description] as alarmDesc, sum(case when endTime is not null then datediff(SS, time, endTime) else 0 end) as duration, count(*) as alarmCount from cte_net LEFT JOIN CT ON CT.No = substring(source_id, 28, 10) and CT.TagName = cte_net.property_name where property_value = 'true' and endTime is not null and datediff(SS, time, endTime) >= 20 group by source_id, property_name, description

select replace(substring(source_id, 28, 10), '_', '') as machineName, (max(convert(float, [property_value])) - min(convert(float, [property_value]))) as capacity from [thingworx2080].[dbo].[value_stream] where [property_name] = 'Output_Qty' and time > CONVERT(varchar(100), #{startTime}, 21) and time < CONVERT(varchar(100), #{endTime}, 21) group by source_id
